results.name: Denominator of quotient=sigma(7n)/sigma(n).
formula: G.f.: Sum_{k>=0} 7^k * x^(7^k) / (1 - x^(7^k)). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Dec 15 2020
mathematica: Table[Denominator[DivisorSigma[1, 7*n]/DivisorSigma[1, n]], {n, 1, 128}] (* corrected by _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Dec 15 2020 *)
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Nov 04 2003
